title: What is something that was discovered today? - Quora

response.answer_text: New astronomical discovery: Three new open clusters discovered in the Milky Way The “latest supernovae” site was just updated: Latest Supernovae The Large Magellanic Cloud is outbound, but seems like it will be heading back to us: http://www.sci-news.com/astronomy/large-magellanic-cloud-milky-way-collision-06788.html
